about.details:
Incorporated in 2004, Manas Properties Ltd is an India-based real estate company. The company is primarily into the business of acquiring properties and leasing / letting it out to their corporate/industrial clients thereby earning lease rentals / license fees as consideration, as well as earning price appreciation (as the case may be). The Company is engaged in the business of developing and renting of immovable properties, and providing real estate marketing and consultancy services wherein they support sales/ lease targets of builders/ developers in return for commission on a fixed/ percentage basis.

Currently company owns a property ad measuring approximately 3,078 square meters of built up area located at Mumbai, which has been leased out to Junobo Hotels Private Limited, for operating “Soho House”, a private luxury club. The Company provides real estate marketing services to Dev Land and Housing Private Limited and other real estate developers in Mumbai.

faqs.question: What is the Manas Properties IPO?
faqs.answer:
Manas Properties IPO is a SME IPO of 1110000 equity shares of the face value of ₹10 aggregating up to ₹39.96 Crores. The issue is priced at ₹360 per share. The minimum order quantity is 300.

The IPO opens on March 17, 2017, and closes on March 22, 2017.

Bigshare Services Pvt Ltd is the registrar for the IPO. The shares are proposed to be listed on BSE SME.

faqs.question: How to apply in Manas Properties IPO through Zerodha?
faqs.answer:
Zerodha customers can apply online in Manas Properties IPO using UPI as a payment gateway. Zerodha customers can apply in Manas Properties IPO by login into Zerodha Console (back office) and submitting an IPO application form.

Steps to apply in Manas Properties IPO through Zerodha

  1. Visit the Zerodha website and login to Console.
  2. Go to Portfolio and click the IPOs link.
  3. Go to the 'Manas Properties IPO' row and click the 'Bid' button.
  4. Enter your UPI ID, Quantity, and Price.
  5. Submit IPO application form.
  6. Visit the UPI App (net banking or BHIM) to approve the mandate.

Visit Zerodha IPO Application Process Review for more detail.

faqs.question: When Manas Properties IPO will open?
faqs.answer: The Manas Properties IPO opens on March 17, 2017 and closes on March 22, 2017.

faqs.question: What is the lot size of Manas Properties IPO?
faqs.answer: Manas Properties IPO lot size is 300, and the minimum amount required is ₹1,08,000.

faqs.question: How to apply for Manas Properties IPO?
faqs.answer: You can apply in Manas Properties IPO online using either UPI or ASBA as a payment method. ASBA IPO application is available in the net banking of your bank account. UPI IPO application is offered by brokers who don't offer banking services. Read more detail about applying IPO online through Zerodha, Upstox, 5Paisa, Nuvama, HDFC Bank, and SBI Bank.
